title: League of Legends (TM) Client has encountered a problem and needs to close.
body:
"League of Legends (TM) Client has encountered a problem and needs to close."

Was logged in for about 6 hours. Just tried to play ranked and got this error. Anyone else getting this error in champ select? Just cost me 3 lp. Now I need a whole extra win to get into series. rip...

replies.body: It sounds like you may have lost connection to the server, as a most common case.  Are you still experiencing this issue?  W can dig a bit deeper at potential causes for this.  Let me know!

Other details:

I am currently running windows 10.

My game client and all drivers are up to date.

I havent seen this problem before.

I played multiple games on the same machine today with no errors.

Before the error occurred, the champ select icon boxes and screen scrambled and half of it went blank.

I minimized and  restored the window in an attempt to fix the visual issue. 

That is when the error appeared on the screen and the client forced closed.
